mapper.select: SELECT ACCOUNTID , CLUBID , MEETNO , MEMBERID , AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(DATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS datetime , CATEGORY , PURPOSE , INCOME_EXPENSE AS incomeExpense , RECEIPT , PAYMENT FROM ACCOUNT_BOOK WHERE CLUBID = #{clubId}
SELECT MEETNO, CLUBID, meetName, meetMon, meetYear FROM meet_name WHERE CLUBID = #{clubId} ORDER BY meetmon DESC

SELECT ACCOUNTID , CLUBID , MEETNO , MEMBERID , AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(DATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS datetime , CATEGORY , PURPOSE , INCOME_EXPENSE AS incomeExpense , RECEIPT , PAYMENT FROM ACCOUNT_BOOK WHERE CLUBID = #{clubId} AND (DATETIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') OR #{startDate} IS NULL OR #{endDate} IS NULL) AND (PURPOSE = #{searchText} OR #{searchText} IS NULL)

SELECT ACCOUNTID , CLUBID , MEETNO , MEMBERID , AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(DATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS datetime , CATEGORY , PURPOSE , INCOME_EXPENSE AS incomeExpense , RECEIPT , PAYMENT FROM ACCOUNT_BOOK WHERE MEMBERID = #{MEMBERID}

SELECT MEETNAME FROM meet_name WHERE meetNo = #{meetNo}
